Install via cmd
'''
curl -O "https://app.unpkg.com/alpinejs@3.1
5.6/files/dist/cdn.min.js"
'''

We want the minified package, and the cdn one.

Alpine UNPKG url: https://app.unpkg.com/alpinejs@3.15.6/files/dist (	
cdn.min.js)
HTMX UNPKG url: https://app.unpkg.com/htmx.org@2.0.8/files/dist (htmx.min.js)
